column4: Is there a way to get the fingerprint of a GPG public key without using the stupid gui?
gpg --list-keys will list all your keys, --list-key email, or name, or whatever, will filter out just those keys.
email? or just --list-keys and then peruse them.  If you just added it, it'll have todays date, it also may be the only one :)
date is a good indication! ty
